keyword: how many calories in miller high life
title: How Many Calories in Miller High Life?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in Miller High Life beer per standard serving, including carbs, sodium, and quick nutrition facts for this classic lager.
h1: How Many Calories in Miller High Life?
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) bottle or can; unopened, chilled lager beer; no mixers or additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by batch, serving size, and brand specifics; alcohol content affects calorie count. Check labels or official sources for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: One 12 fl oz serving of Miller High Life has ~110 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Larger 16 fl oz serving (vs. 12 fl oz)

faqs.q: How many calories in one Miller High Life beer?
faqs.a: About 110 kcal in a standard 12 fl oz bottle.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Miller High Life?
faqs.a: Approximately 9.6 g carbs per 12 fl oz serving, with 0 g fiber or sugars.

faqs.q: Does Miller High Life have protein or fat?
faqs.a: No protein or fat; calories come primarily from carbohydrates and alcohol.

faqs.q: How does serving size affect calories in Miller High Life?
faqs.a: Calories scale with volumeâ€”e.g., 16 fl oz has ~147 kcal.
Yes, only ~5 mg sodium per 12 fl oz serving.
